group_1.textCenter: (More people know about us losing the Horse @than I thought...)
(Hopefully Witches reappearing will distract them @a bit...)

group_1.textLeft: Sakuya?

group_1.textRight: Yep, this is Sakuya, @your wonderful right-hand girl.

group_1.textLeft: How was the response when you told people about @the Witches...?

group_1.textRight: Our members were happy, but @Ryuugasaki doesn't seem to believe it...
They'd rather believe Juri over us, it seems...

group_1.textLeft: Sounds like they're fiercely loyal to their leader...
But that's not the only reason they wouldn't take @you seriously, is it?

group_1.textRight: ...The leak about the Horse is playing out @just as badly as we thought it would...
Ryuugasaki is probably thinking something like... @"If we keep fighting so there's less "eating",
and Witches come back, that'd be ideal." @Basically, [chara:302100:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302100:cheek_0][chara:302100:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302100:lipSynch_1]"Why SHOULDN'T we fight?"

group_1.textLeft: A logical conclusion anyone could reach, except for @the fact that people's lives are at stake here.

group_1.textRight: Yuna...

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: I've never seen the Horse myself, either...
But if we really lost her, @and our whole group is in danger,
let me go try to negotiate a truce with Juri.

group_1.textLeft: There's no point in doing that... In fact, @you couldn't pick a worse time for it.
Going to them to negotiate is as good as admitting @that we're weaker than ever.
And if they decided to take you prisoner, @we'd be in an even worse position.
You know what would happen next, don't you...?

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* They'd start hunting us down.

group_1.textLeft: So right now, the best thing to do is be patient, @alright?

group_1.textRight: ...Okay.
Alright then, I'll try to pass the news along to more @Ryuugasaki members.

group_1.textLeft: My apologies for making you do all of this...

group_1.textCenter: (Did Sakuya forget to tell me something...?)

group_1.textLeft: I have nothing to say to you.

group_1.textRight: Aw, c'mon, Sis! @No need to be so harsh with me, y'know?
We spent half a year on the same team, remember?

group_1.textLeft: And then after all that time, @you decided to up and leave us, Juri.

group_1.textRight: 'Cause you weren't dealin' with the "food" problem. @Or did ya want me to turn into a Witch and take one @for the team?

group_1.textLeft: Was that honestly the only reason you left us?
For someone who had been running roughshod, @I must say I'm rather underwhelmed.

group_1.textRight: Shut up, you wannabe leader... @Who the hell do you think you are?
Juri the Great's been leadin' these girls for a half a @year! You think you can just start bossin' us around?

group_1.textLeft: You've only been leading them with brute force and fear.
Now that Senpai is gone, I'm the one who will carry @on her legacy and give these girls some sense of @stability.

group_1.textRight: And you're usin' brute force to get me to fall in line. @How ironic is that?

group_1.textLeft: You wouldn't listen to me otherwise, would you?

group_1.textRight: ...Heehee... [chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102400:cheek_0][chara:102400:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102400:lipSynch_1]More or less. Alright, fine. @Have it your way.
But you're gonna regret lettin' me live.
The longer I wait, the hotter my flames burn...
When I finally get another chance to fight you,
you'll be torched well-done by Juri the Great's @inferno.

group_1.textLeft: I defeated you and forced you to work under me for @six months. I can't imagine how much you hated that.
But it's still wrong of you to get others involved in @your own personal grudge.
So let's put an end to this pointless conflict.

group_1.textRight: You got some nerve callin' it pointless.
From the moment I joined your team, to the @moment I left it 'cause of the "food" shortage,
and through the year that's passed since then, @my urge to beat you has only gotten stronger.

group_1.textLeft: Leave the rest of our teams out of this.

group_1.textRight: They're doin' what they're doin' out of their own free will.
I wouldn't force them to do anything.
If you want them to stay outta this, then feel free to reason with 'em yourself.
If you can really prove the Witches are back, they'll probably listen to ya.
But you can't, and that's why they're with me now.

group_1.textLeft: Ngh...
Can't you hold off a bit longer?

group_1.textRight: I'm not waitin' another moment. I ain't gonna miss @this chance.
It's war, from here on out.
Juri the Great can't forgive herself for cooperating @with you for so long.
It's time for my revenge.

group_1.textCenter: You truly are just out to crush me...
